page.title: 02 HOLIDAYS
page.content: This area is popular with tourists and they stay at Naish Farm, Cobb's Camp or in guest houses. In the summer time the roads are packed with holiday makers coming to see the tourist attractions. Beaches are great tourist attractions in this area, most popular is Highcliffe Castle beach, which gets very crowded during the height of summer. Unfortunately most of our beaches have weaver fish living on them. Another unfortunate thing is that the cliffs all along the coast keep eroding and there is less sand. The New Forest is only a few miles away and tourists go to see the ponies. The Sammy Miller Motor-Cycle Museum in New Milton is Europe's largest. By Philippa Thompson, Kerry Pearce and Samantha Tattum.
